Description

Enchain is a retro-themed first-person shooter, currently in development, that puts a spin on the conventions of modern titles while also pulling from the pioneers of the genre.

History

Originally developed for Ludum Dare 40 in under 72 hours. Theme: "The more you have, the worse it is."

Features

  • Fast paced, 90s inspired gunplay in open environments.
  • Grapple chain movement and combat mechanics.

About Matthew Lawrence

Boilerplate
My name is Matthew Lawrence and I make games, videos, and other media. My main project is Enchain, a small, experimental first person shooter which I develop alone.
